gaussianclassesinfo¶

Currently in development.

class pyssian.gaussianclassesinfo.GOF_info(File, ParseList=None)[source]¶

Bases: pyssian.gaussianclasses.GaussianOutFile

Gaussian 09 .out file parent class, if any special type of calculation requires different processing it should be a subclass of this one

BlockFetcher()[source]¶

Generator that yields the text sliced in blocks and their type.

A block is an iterable of strings and its type refers to how it should be parsed, ranges from Link 1 block, to Link 9999 (1,9999), something in betweem Link Blocks (-1) or no End was found (-9999)

BlockHandler()[source]¶

Coroutine. Receives a block, chooses the parser and parses it

FileStructure()[source]¶

Display the structure of links and internal jobs of the file

Reader(File)[source]¶

Generator for line by line reading without stopiteration

clean()[source]¶

Removes per each InternalJob stored all the EmptyLinkJobs

update(Clean=True, EndPrint=False)[source]¶

Try to fetch new content in the File, if the new content exists try to update the last added InternalJob, if it was already finished and a new InternalJob has started, it creates it and adds it.

If Clean is set to True it will automatically remove any emtpy LinkJob

class pyssian.gaussianclassesinfo.IJ_info(Number=None)[source]¶

Bases: pyssian.gaussianclasses.InternalJob

Gaussian 09 InternalJob parent class, if any special type of Job requires different parsing it should be a subclass of this one

GetLinks(*LinkIds)[source]¶

Wrapper Method to get a list of Links with certain Ids

GuessInfo()[source]¶

Guesses the number and type attributes of itself using the stored Links.

append(Link)[source]¶
clean()[source]¶

Removes all the Empty Link instances within Links
